channel.title: Partnerships on Ergo
channel.description: Recent content in Partnerships on Ergo

item.title: WrapAssets announces integration with ErgoDEX!
item.description: ErgoDEX team recently published Plutus Port proposal on Cardanoâ€™s Project Catalyst platform. It offers a cross-chain exchange built on top of Ergo Blockchain for Cardano Ecosystem. WrapAssets is a service provider for wrapped assets (like waBTC, waETH, waDOT) on top of Cardano Ecosystem. This integration will help ErgoDEX to achieve high liquidity and ADA holders can benefit from a secure cross-chain DEX with a variety of ready-to-use assets. WrapAssets.io As Cardano marching towards the Goguen Era, cross-chain integrations will be available across Cardano Ecosystem.
